title: BRING_VEHICLE_TO_HALT
content:
0x260BE8F09E326A200xCBC7D3C8// BringVehicleToHalt
void BRING_VEHICLE_TO_HALT(Vehicle vehicle, float distance, int duration, BOOL bControlVerticalVelocity);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to stop.distance: The distance from the initial coords at which the vehicle should come to rest.duration: The length of time in seconds to hold the car at rest after stopping.bControlVerticalVelocity: false by default which allows gravity to act normally in the z direction. Enable this option to halt the vehicle's vertical velocity as well.This native makes the vehicle stop immediately, as it happens when we enter a multiplayer garage.Old name:  _SET_VEHICLE_HALT
codeBlocks:
// BringVehicleToHalt
void BRING_VEHICLE_TO_HALT(Vehicle vehicle, float distance, int duration, BOOL bControlVerticalVelocity);
